name: Frazier Barr
comment: Very good car with fabulous drive quality. I would recommend you ones buy this car if you have money, looks are very inspiring, service is very good and in ones a year you have to get this car serviced

name: Sadie Keller
comment: 1.Real good upgrade 2.Phenomenal sport mode 3.Looks great., seats not so comfortable and cozy like Audi 4. Not yet serviced but bought the pack 5.ground clearance not bad but still a concern. Bmw assistant have limited commands 6. No playing music when throttle hard the rumble and roaring of the engine is the real music that any enthusiast will die for

name: Mccall Finch
comment: Nice mileage, nice car, nice looks of 2021.amazing experience, good engine, little high maintenance but elegant in looks, a polished car, music system is also mind blowing and its automatic.

name: Mcconnell Copeland
comment: I love the car so much because I love BMW company so much and when I bought my dream car of BMW 3 series then I really surprised that the car have amazing features and its interior and exterior. I don't worry about mileage because it's my dream car and I am so happy after buying this superb sports sedan car. The driving experience is so smooth than any car and I drive this car everyday when I go to office. I felt so excitement when I drive this car. I m satisfied from this car.

name: Eleanor Wolf
comment: No words to describe ! It's absolutely a brilliant car. Feels like a sports car. I am having it since 2012 , the luxury line. Was one of the first few people who got it. It was, is and will be an eye catcher and a legend. Absolutely timeless design. The ultimate 3 series was and is and would be the f30. Also no compromise on luxury. It's absolutely scintillating in that regard. A charm. A drift machine. A cool piece of machinery. Would never sell that. It's been my mate since 9 years now. Love it. The black color on it looks so elegant. It's a fantastic package.

name: Ortiz Buchanan
comment: The sales executives are too friendly and cooperative They provide me each and every details regarding the car and soo helpful . The way they deal is really impressive and friendly
